allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Compatibility: replace removed jax.dlpack API with standard DLPack protocol

jax.dlpack.to_dlpack/from_dlpack were removed in JAX v0.7.0. Use
torch.from_dlpack and jnp.from_dlpack which rely on the standard
__dlpack__ protocol. Also add mpax/jax to extras_require.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
